website_summaries.verdict: The Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn is an invitation for consumers to go for the preppy look. Not only does it matches well with a buttoned-down oxford shirt, polo shirt, blazers, and chinos, but it is also made to smarten up one’s look with its use of fabrics other than the typical canvas. Although there are no wild techs integrated into its rather simple façade, this sneaker comes comfortably with the use of breathable and flexible textiles, as well as sufficient cushioning around the collar and footbed.
pros: The Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn low-top sneaker is convenient for everyday use
It provides an adequate fit, noted by many
It isn’t heavy on the feet
some even mentioned it feels like a pair of cozy slippers
Well recommended for long walks, brought up by several reviewers
Its stuffed collar and adequate cushioning on the inlay sole provide comfort to the feet, cited by many
Its fabric cover is made of light material which makes the entire weight of the shoe less than expected
The Polo Ralph Lauren Vaughn is a decent and classy shoe design that comes with leather laces
The available colors, excellent, fit, and satisfactory comfort are some of the reasons why many buyers decided to purchase more than one pair
Exceptional value for a signature shoe with outstanding quality
It’s a stylish sneaker which can be easily coordinated with autumn, spring, and summer clothing
Its sole will last for a lot, imparted by several purchasers
cons: Some users would have liked it better if this shoe came in different width selections
At least one wearer reported that the top inner lining of the shoe peeled off and cannot be mended
The top of the shoe may tend to be wrinkly
The sole is beginning to come undone in less than a month

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart after one use!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe, it's very attractive footwear however it has durability issues. I was surprised when I opened the box and realized the shoes themselves are very light. My first thought was "uh oh these feel cheap". Maybe my expectations are too high for a 60$ pair of shoes but I am very disappointed that only having put these shoes on for one outing so far of gentle use (walking on pavement), the rubber outsole is already beginning to peel off. It's unfortunate because the shoe looks very nice but has already begun falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair of walking around shoes for summer. Got a number of compliments on them on the first three days I wore them. They provide no support so if you have high arches order them a little larger and get some insoles. I hope they're not bastards to clean. for 50 bucks I think they were a good Choice. They are a little long for my feet and feel a little like clown shoes but that depends on the socks I wear.
customer_reviews.author: eyez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes, I will cry if Polo ever discontinues them
customer_reviews.text: Im a 47yr old man and love these shoes. Very comfortable shoes, can pretty much wear with anything. In comparing them to Chucks and Vans these shoes are lighter, and more flexible, comfortable inside to wear without socks and do not leave an odor. Highly recommended then for a nice casual look
customer_reviews.author: Mannydc73

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking shoe - probably my favorite of the Polo sneakers. Unfortunately, the quality of the make really is inferior. I've had my pair for a little under two months now, wearing them on a regular basis but not daily, and they are literally falling apart. The sole on the right shoe is already coming unhinged, and the glue keeping the white rubber to the canvas is beginning to give up. Not recommended if you plan on actually wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeppe

customer_reviews.title: They are nice but
customer_reviews.text: I have foot issues, plantar fasciitis, I can wear any shoes just not a lot of standing or walk. With these shoe they do this "banana" thing where they bow to the sky after being broken in. When I put them on now, after the break in period, I cannot walk to get the mail without pain. Obviously this review is not for everyone but if you have foot conditions I would find a different pair. I can't return them because they are used now and I can't get any good use out of the. Time to donate.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, probably knock-off, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my boyfriend, he wears them afew days during the week, first week or two is great, but then they start to fall apart, and cause immense foot pain. Pictures are after 2 months within gifti g them. DO NOT BUY, you'd be better off buying some adidas.
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart even though brand new
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shoe, but within weeks the white band had cracked at certain stress points and now at 3 months in they are basically falling apart. The white band has almost completely separated on both shoes and is not what I expected from Polo Ralph Lauren at this price point. Really disappointing​.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ernst

customer_reviews.title: This Shoe Will Fall Apart On You
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great shoe if it didn't fall apart after only 2 months of normal use. Judge for yourself whether you'd tolerate the wear and tear that my pair has.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son, at his request, and he absolutely loves them. He said these shoes are unbelievably comfortable and loves the look of them. All around great buy and they arrived days ahead of scheduled drop off date, thank you for such great service!!!
customer_reviews.author: LEIGHANN ALEXANDRIA FOLEY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome show. The leather laces are crap though
customer_reviews.text: Awesome show. The leather laces are crap though. They come undone in 3 minutes and you can't tie them super tight because the leather breaks. Get your own laces and you'll love this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Lemont

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and really are quite comfortable. I added an insole for extra comfort. The leather laces are holding up nicely and they are extremely light on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 16 year old son. He loves them and says they are really comfortable. They look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ula

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. Bought it for my hubby and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Laura V.

customer_reviews.title: feel so good he can run in them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my fickle son's feet. He said they fit so well they feel like running shoes. They are super attractive right out of the box. He pleased and i am too. Ran true to size for us. Also came with extra white shoestrings beyond the leather ones
customer_reviews.author: pdandj

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but get dirty fast.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes a lot. They're a rather nice material and look quite nice. I've even worn them on job interviews and received compliments on them. The only downside is that the canvas picks up dirt like crazy. The material looks nicer than what Converse shoes are made of, but they get dirty FAST. I had my pair for a few days and it was already starting to look a bit dirty. It may be possible to wash them, but I haven't put in that effort yet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sluka

customer_reviews.title: The bottoms are not standard Polo bottoms. When you ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms are not standard Polo bottoms. When you wipe the bottoms to clean any dirt or smudges the debris smears from side to side no matter what type of cleaner or cloth you use. They also had burgundy spots on the material that I could not remove.
customer_reviews.author: Substance

customer_reviews.title: Too big (compared to same style and color shoe)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2 of the same pair of shoes in the same color, and for whatever reason, the pair I ordered from Amazon is a full size too big. Unfortunately, I waited too long to return
customer_reviews.author: Jo Van Dam

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. I love them. I had them long time ago and now I bought them again in a different color. They are comfortable, materials so good quality and you get two sets of shoelaces (brown and white in this case) to suit your preferences better.
customer_reviews.author: César

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son, fits well, true to size, color is exactly as advertised. He says it's comfortable and recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are great stylish shoes from Ralph Lauren. I wear them everyday. Probably my favorite pair of shoes I've wear in my entire lifetime. If you don't want to always wear sneakers, this is a great alternative. Great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mixtape

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, needs better arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and the bright colors. I have high arches and these do offer pretty minimal arch support which limits how long I can wear them comfortably. Other than the arch support, great shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have fit
customer_reviews.text: The materials are nice quality and the shoe is quite comfy. The only reason I gave it a low score is that the shoe is so narrow. If you have wide feet it does that unattractive "gushing" thing. Not the shoe for people with big and wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Polo Ralph Lauren Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived in a timely fashion, I put them on immediately and have been wearing them ever since. It is hard to separate myself from them. They are true to size and width (I usually wear a regular width shoe). If you are considering these shoes I would definitely recommend them. This is my second pair-I previously had a brown leather pair that I literally wore out. I took a chance on this pair and I am really happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda B. Spillers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fashion sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Size 13 (EU 46) is often (too) tight for me, but these shoes give me plenty of space fortunately. In case you're doubting between two sizes, going for the smaller size may be the best option. The shoes look great and the quality so far seems solid (just 3 weeks though). The insoles also offer decent support. The canvas material is very nice and thick. The downside is that they are relatively hot for the summer. Overall a very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe the color and texture is awesome and I get compliments on them everytime I wear them people want to know where I bought them from the shoe is also very comfortable

It would be better to use them with an orthopedic insole. Manufacturer's glue is not so strong, out sole separated little bit from both two sides on second day.

But with Amazon it is no problem exchanging, so that's good. Leather shoe strings look much sturdier than the same-looking shoelaces in cheaper shoes. But they also come with a spare set of shoelaces in white.

At least the color that I purchased isn't like the color shown in the picture. The color is darker than the one amazon shows. At least for me it doesn't matter because the color is still nice.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price!

Plaid w/ Green Logo - 4 Stars. I would rate these higher but I feel like the colors are significantly more muted in person than online. I haven't decided whether to return them or not. Overall, close to a 5 star. I wouldn't recommend walking 10 miles in these but they are good for everyday use.

product_meta.title: POLO RALPH LAUREN Men's Vaughn Suede Sneaker
feature_bullets: Oxford-inspired fashion sneaker with faux rawhide laces and contrasting accents
